answers.answer: You can actually go around 28 days without food so long as you have water.  You're obcessing over this, and need not be. You have a lot of anxiety about this, and when you don't eat you start to panic which makes you feel lightheaded and like you will pass out which everyone does during a panic attack, but we don't, nor will you. You've convinced yourself of this so when you do eat, it comforts you.  Low blood sugar has to be extreme for one to pass out as many other symptoms occur long before this which would make you see your doctor before it got this bad.  This would be detectable even if it were slightly low when you went to the hospital.  You need to get help with your anxiety, therapy and/or medication.  Therapy will teach you how to cope and relaxation skills.  You are not alone, and we're always here to support you and offer advice.  There are many here who have or are enduring what you are.  Please get help so that you can get your life back.  Take care...
